content.rendered:
Thousands of Newly Traded Books Are Shelved Weekly at Gottwals!

Don’t forget that we are sending thousands of newly traded books from our warehouse back to the stores on a weekly basis. You never know what new treasures you will find day to day! This assortment was sent to the Macon store this morning.

Melissa & Doug® Role Playing Costumes!

Halloween is just around the corner and Gottwals Books in Perry has a great selection of role playing costumes for 20% off! Bring your kids & find the perfect outfit that they can play in all year long.

Gottwals Books: 20% OFF Toys in October!

excerpt.rendered: Don’t forget that we are sending thousands of newly traded books from our warehouse back to the stores on a weekly basis.
